title: Election Night Jamboree: We Still Won't Know! 11.3.20
itunes:title: Election Night Jamboree: We Still Won't Know! 11.3.20
description:
In episode was 751, Jack and Miles are joined by activist and organizer Taz Ahmed to discuss election night updates.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Most States Have No Laws About Guns in Polling Places
  2. Michigan Supreme Court declines to intervene in challenge to open carry at the polls
  3. States grapple with open-carry gun laws and the polls
  4. Election Security Experts Warn of Voter Intimidation as 'Trump Train' Caravans Plan to Pass Through Polling Sites
  5. Suspicious robocall campaign warning people to ‘stay home’ spooks voters nationwide
  6. Three Words That Haunt Joe Biden: ‘Dewey Defeats Truman’

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
